question: Dora had 15 pencils. She gave 5 pencils to her friend. How many pencils does Dora have left?
There were 19 balloons at the party. 8 balloons popped. How many balloons are left?
There were 25 students in the class. 5 students went home early. How many students are left in the class?
A pet shop had 12 puppies. 10 puppies were adopted. How many puppies are left at the pet shop?
Ammy had 16 stickers. She gave 5 stickers to her friends. How many stickers does Ammy have left?
